page.title: 05RELIGION - Lydham/More
page.content:
CHURCH of ENGLAND.
{ Holy Trinity Church, Lydham. { St. Peter's Church, More. { Services are taken alternately at each by the Rector of Wentnor. Supported mainly by older people, but churches and churchyards kept well decorated and maintained. Number on{electoral roll,}1985. Lydham: {25 }More: {23
Local W.I. completed a{Churchyard {Survey }(inscriptions, flora,etc.) in 1984.
METHODISTS:- have to travel to chapels in{Bishop's Castle and Clun Circuit.
ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH: nearest is at{ {Plowden. }
